General.Name: Ducgiang Chemicals & Detergent Powder Joint Co
General.Description: Duc Giang Chemicals Group Joint Stock Company primarily produces and sells detergent powders and liquids, and chemical products in Vietnam. It offers detergent powder, washing powder, bleach, laundry water, fabric softener, dish washing liquid and water, floor cleaner, toilet bowl cleaner, hand wash gel, and wash hand products; and chemical products, such as yellow phosphorus, ferro phosphor, phosphoric acid, natri phosphate, polyphotphate, and hexamathaphosphate, aluminium ammonium sulfate, CUSO4.5H2O, zinc sulfate, kali hydrophotphat, and amoni hydroxide. The company also provides fertilizers, including NPK, mono ammonium phosphate, triple super phosphate, single super phosphate, and diamoni phosphate; food and industry grade phosphoric acid; and feed additives comprising dicalcium, monocalcium, monodicalcium, and tricalcium phosphate. In addition, it manufactures and trades in other chemical products, such as H3PO4, pharmaceuticals, pure chemicals, and technical chemicals. The company was formerly known as Duc Giang Chemicals And Detergent Powder Joint Stock Company and changed its name to Duc Giang Chemicals Group Joint Stock Company in April 2019. Duc Giang Chemicals Group Joint Stock Company was founded in 1963 and is based in Hanoi, Vietnam.
